did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, printed material, bills, statistics, accounts, alphabetical and subject files, photographs, and other material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, printed material on equipment, bills and expenses, grape statistics, accounts with grape growers, alphabetical and subject files, photographs, and other material of the Widmer Wine Cellars, Naples, New York. Includes correspondence with numerous American producers of grapes and wine.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, printed material on equipment, bills and expenses, grape statistics, accounts with grape growers, alphabetical and subject files, photographs, and other material of the Widmer Wine Cellars, Naples, New York. Includes correspondence with numerous American producers of grapes and wine.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Widmer Wine Cellars Records, #3141. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Photographs of a presentation to the New York State Agricultural Experiment Station by Widmer executives. Includes a photo of Dr. John Einset.
